title: Strengthening System Design Practical Skills: Motivation-Based Online Learning Design for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory knowledge and experience with online learning tools
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design online learning content based on the five elements of the music motivation model (expressiveness, challenge, curiosity, collaboration, recognition).
Learners can apply a mixed-methods approach (integrating quantitative and qualitative data analysis) to assess learners' motivation levels.
Learners can develop at least two microlearning scenarios incorporating motivational strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
